Voice-activated printing: Develop a printer that can be activated by voice commands, allowing users to print documents without having to touch the device. This would be particularly useful for people with disabilities or those who are unable to use a traditional printer. Confidence score: 0.8

Smart printing: Create a printer that can analyze the contents of a document and automatically adjust printing settings such as color, ink levels, and paper size. This would save time and reduce waste, as users wouldn't have to manually adjust these settings. Confidence score: 0.9

3D printing: Develop a printer that can print in 3D, allowing users to create physical objects from digital designs. This would be particularly useful for hobbyists, artists, and engineers. Confidence score: 0.7

Portable printing: Create a printer that is small enough to be carried around, allowing users to print on the go. This would be particularly useful for businesses that need to print documents while traveling or for individuals who need to print documents in remote locations. Confidence score: 0.9

Augmented reality printing: Develop a printer that can overlay digital images onto the real world, allowing users to print objects in augmented reality. This would be particularly useful for gamers, educators, and architects. Confidence score: 0.8
